info.+content: after the events of w.d.c. (zexal I) yuma & astral still got to collect all the remaining other numbers card, with the memories of astral´s dimension. meanwhile new enemies appears from barian world. there are also new allies and still are some new misteries between duels.
#1: "Halfway to forever" by Michael Brady, Shane Guenego, Arthur Murakami, Jonathan Lattif (eps 1-)
#1: "Unbreakable Heart (折れないハート Arenai Hāto)" by Hideaki Takatori (eps 1-25)
#2: "Kagami no Dual-ism (鏡のデュアル・イズム;The Mirror of Dual-ism)" by petit milady (eps 1-25)
#1: "Artist (アーティスト Ātisuto)" by Vistlip (eps 1-25)
遊☆戯☆王ゼアルⅡ：あにてれ：テレビ東京
